name: "Fashion Show"
desc: Chiori's specialty. At the ministrations of her nimble fingers, even the common taiyaki is transformed, garbed in glorious fillings that serenade the senses, regaling your taste buds and eyes with such a grand feast that it threatens to overwhelm them. It would be no overstatement to call this a masterpiece of culinary artistry.

customize.name: Recipe: Taiyaki
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Taiyaki.

customize.name: Taiyaki
customize.desc: A snack shaped like a snapper. The crisp exterior wraps the sweet filling within and is very popular amongst Inazumans. It is said that in the beginning, this was just a cylindrical snack, but constant improvements wound up shaping it into the cutesy image of a fish.

customize.name: Chiori
customize.desc: The owner of Chioriya Boutique. A tailor renowned throughout Fontaine.

customize.name: "Fashion Show"
customize.desc: Chiori's specialty. At the ministrations of her nimble fingers, even the common taiyaki is transformed, garbed in glorious fillings that serenade the senses, regaling your taste buds and eyes with such a grand feast that it threatens to overwhelm them. It would be no overstatement to call this a masterpiece of culinary artistry.

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Recipe: Taiyaki
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Taiyaki.

customize.name: Kiminami Anna
customize.desc: The owner of Kiminami Restaurant. She sells various food dishes and recipes.

value.text: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.
